title.zh: 线上：腾讯公益《携带者检测援助》项目启动
title.en: Online: Tencent Charity 'Carrier Testing Assistance' Project Launch

description.zh: 在腾讯公益久久公益节期间，南昌市血之友公益协会在南昌市慈善总会指导下，由左国良和左钰洁申请的《携带者检测援助》项目正式启动。左钰洁制作了专业的项目宣传海报和视频，为血友病女性携带者提供检测费用援助，这是国内首个专门针对血友病女性群体的公益援助项目。
description.en: During Tencent Charity's 99 Giving Day, the 'Carrier Testing Assistance' project applied for by Zuo Guoliang and Yujie (Ruby) Zuo from Nanchang Hemophilia Association was officially launched under the guidance of Nanchang Charity Federation. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo created professional project promotional posters and videos to provide testing cost assistance for female hemophilia carriers, marking the first charity assistance project in China specifically targeting women with hemophilia.
